meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Machine</kanji>s <kanji>dislike</kanji> everything. Their <vocabulary>mood</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>temper</vocabulary>, is very sour. What about your mood?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. けん gets changed to げん, though, so don't let that ruin your <vocabulary>mood</vocabulary>.
